A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi is probably the most visually striking film in the canon.  The direction that Rian Johnson took the characters was believable and needed.  Unlike Rogue One where there was little character development\, this movie spent a great deal of time explaining character motivations.  There were some moments that were unnecessary and some that could have been executed a bit better\, but overall\, the story took sharp unexpected turns and never became predictable.  While I understand some fans will dislike this movie\, I firmly believe that is because they built their own stories in their heads and were disappointed when those theories did not pay off.  This is a great film.....but you will not leave happy.
